roomDescription: You wake up in a dimly lit, industrial-chic workspace, the air thick with the scent of stale coffee and faint traces of snack food. The long wooden table is cluttered with laptops, chargers, and half-empty cups, while the hum of Edison bulbs casts long shadows across the dark walls. Somewhere in this lived-in chaos, a way out must exist—but where?
loseCondition: After 60 minutes, the room's emergency lighting flickers violently before plunging you into darkness. A mechanical voice echoes: 'Session terminated. Please remain seated.' The door seals shut permanently.

frame.description: This is the laptop, one of several open notebooks scattered across the long wooden table. Its screen glows softly amid the surrounding clutter of chargers, water bottles, and coffee cups — a focal point of the active working environment.
frame.pov: Looking down at the laptop on the table surface from a slightly elevated angle, with its illuminated screen visible alongside nearby cables, drink containers, and other personal items.

clue.discovery: The laptop screen flickers to life, displaying a locked note titled 'Project Phoenix.' Beneath the password prompt, a sticky note reads: 'Hint: Where ideas take shape... but not on this screen.' The keyboard has a single key missing—the 'B' key—revealing a small compartment underneath. Inside, you find a torn scrap of paper with the word 'WHITEBOARD' scribbled in marker.
clue.premature_discovery: The laptop is password-protected. The screen displays: 'Access denied. Try again later.' The keyboard feels loose, but nothing else is immediately accessible.
clue.riddle: I’m where thoughts are drawn, not typed or stored. Erased and rewritten, but never ignored. Find me where the markers play, and the next clue will lead the way.
clue.hiddenAreaDescription: A close-up of the laptop's keyboard, with the 'B' key pried off to reveal a small, shallow compartment underneath. The torn edge of a sticky note peeks out, bearing the faint imprint of marker ink.

frame.description: This is the whiteboard, a large dry-erase board mounted on the dark wall near the far end of the room. It carries remnants of brainstorming sessions — scribbled diagrams, sticky notes, and half-erased marker strokes, standing as a silent record of collaborative planning.
frame.pov: Looking directly at the whiteboard from a close vantage point, with the dark wall filling the background and the edge of the central table just barely visible below.

clue.discovery: The whiteboard is a mess of half-erased diagrams and sticky notes. One corner, however, is cleaner than the rest—a small, rectangular outline is barely visible beneath the marker stains. You wipe away the residue to reveal a magnetic compartment. Inside, a small silver key is taped to the back, alongside a note: 'Listen to the rhythm of the room.' The key is labeled 'STUDIO LIGHT.'
clue.premature_discovery: The whiteboard is covered in scribbles and sticky notes. You try to erase a section, but the marker is stubborn, leaving faint smudges. Nothing seems out of place—yet.
clue.riddle: I stand tall but don’t reach the ceiling, my head adjusts to set the right feeling. Seek me where light is controlled, and the next step will unfold.
clue.hiddenAreaDescription: A close-up of the whiteboard's lower right corner, where a rectangular outline is visible beneath the marker stains. A small, hinged magnetic compartment is slightly ajar, revealing a silver key taped to the inside.

frame.description: This is the studio light, a tall professional lighting fixture positioned towards the back of the room. Its adjustable head and sturdy tripod stand give the space a creative, production-ready feel alongside the industrial Edison bulbs overhead.
frame.pov: Looking towards the studio light standing in the deeper section of the room, its tall silhouette rising above the surrounding furniture, with the dark ceiling and exposed ductwork visible behind it.

clue.discovery: The studio light's tripod has a small, unmarked panel near the base. You press it, and it clicks open to reveal a hidden slot—perfectly shaped for the silver key. Inside, a note reads: 'The beat goes on, but not without you. Find the pulse of the room.' The key turns, and a small drawer slides out, containing a drumstick with a note wrapped around it: 'The final piece waits where the rhythm sleeps.'
clue.premature_discovery: The studio light is off, its head tilted downward. You inspect the tripod, but nothing seems unusual—just a sturdy, professional lighting stand.
clue.riddle: I keep the beat but don’t march in line, my home is where the music shines. Find me where the sticks lay still, and escape will bend to your will.
clue.hiddenAreaDescription: A close-up of the studio light's tripod base, where a small, unmarked panel has popped open. Inside, a silver key is inserted into a hidden slot, and a slender drawer is partially extended, revealing a drumstick with a note tied around it.

frame.description: This is the drums, a drum kit set up in a far corner of the space, well away from the central work table. Its presence adds a creative, eclectic character to the room — a reminder that this space serves more than just office work.
frame.pov: Looking across the room towards the distant drum kit tucked into the far corner, with cymbals and drum shells faintly visible past the clutter of the main workspace area.

clue.discovery: The drum kit is tucked away in the corner, its cymbals and drumheads collecting dust. You notice one of the toms has a loose head—peeling it back reveals a hollow cavity inside the drum. Nestled within is a small, ornate key labeled 'EXIT.' A note beside it reads: 'The jacket holds the last secret. Return to where warmth was left behind.'
clue.premature_discovery: The drum kit looks untouched, its surfaces covered in a thin layer of dust. You tap the drums, but they sound dull and lifeless—nothing seems out of the ordinary.
clue.riddle: I’m left behind when the work is done, a shell of comfort, warmth, and sun. Find me where fabric meets chair, and the final lock will be laid bare.
clue.hiddenAreaDescription: A close-up of the drum kit's tom, with the drumhead peeled back to reveal a hollow interior. Inside, a small, ornate key glints under the dim light, resting beside a folded note.

frame.description: This is the chair with a jacket, an office chair draped with someone's jacket or hoodie left behind. It sits near the back of the room, giving the impression that its owner stepped away momentarily from a long working session.
frame.pov: Looking at the chair from a moderate distance, the jacket hanging loosely over the backrest, with the dark floor and nearby furniture providing context to its position in the room.

clue.discovery: The jacket draped over the chair feels heavier than it should. You search the pockets and find a small, locked box tucked inside the inner lining. The ornate key from the drum fits perfectly. Inside the box, a note reads: 'The door was never locked—only hidden. Look where the light doesn’t reach.' You turn to see the red curtains near the chair shift slightly, revealing a narrow gap. Behind them, a small, previously invisible door is now ajar, leading to a dimly lit hallway. You step through and escape the room.
clue.hiddenAreaDescription: A close-up of the jacket's inner pocket, where a small, locked box is nestled. The ornate key is inserted into the box's lock, and the lid is slightly open, revealing a note inside. The red curtains in the background are parted just enough to reveal the edge of a hidden door.
